name: Pixelman Volleyball
description:
This is my 6th game in my one week game series!

This is a local coop game, or single player. Exhibition mode allows for the competitive coop 1 v 1 match. You can also play against computer players in this mode for practice. If you're looking for a challenge, then jump into Champion Mode. You will face off against 7 opponents to claim your volleyball championship! Losing in this mode will require you to restart from the beginning.

Player 1 Controls:

A & D move left and right

W to jump and spike

S to bump

Player 2 Controls:

Left & Right arrows to move

Up arrow to jump and spike

Down arrow to bump

Enjoyed the game? Did you know I make a new game every week? I do and you can follow each week's game by following my youtube here: One Week Games - YouTube or by following my daily updates on my instagram here: Nate Whitehead (@1weekgames) • Instagram photos and videos
